name: Kekistan: This is War
description:
This is War! You, as a Kekistani half human, half robot has to go back in time and change it once and for all!

The year is 2035, Kekistani scientists finally figured out a way on how to travel in time. Thus, by having a pressure from Normies, they have created you, half human - half robot Kekistani Terminator! Your main objective is to travel back in time and kill as many Normies as possible.

The main objective of the game is to kill as many Normies as possible. This is basically a "skirmish" game, which means you have to fight till you die. Gain most kills, best score and get it done with a little time as possible.

Currently single player only. Co-Op is planned for December of this year.Controls:
  • WASD - Walk
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse Click Left - Shoot
  • Mouse Scroll Mouse - Switch weapon
  • Esc - Quit game
